scripts.text:
IF OBJECT_ID('[Operations].[GroupCapexCommitedExpenditure]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Operations].[GroupCapexCommitedExpenditure]

	SELECT		[Unit Price] * CAST([Ordered Quantity] AS NUMERIC(28,4)) AS [Ordered Amount]
	,			CAST(LEFT([Pick up Date],10) AS DATE) AS [Promised Delivery Date]
	,			p.[Party Email Address]	AS [Requester]
	,			po.[Last Update Date] AS [Line Last Updated Date]
	,			[Purchase Document Currency] AS [Currency]
	,			CAST([Ordered Quantity] AS NUMERIC(28,4)) AS [Net Ordered Quantity]
	,			p.[Party Name] AS [Buyer]
	,			NULLIF(CONCAT(gls.[SEGMENT1],'-',gls.[SEGMENT2],'-',gls.[SEGMENT3],'-',gls.[SEGMENT4],'-',gls.[SEGMENT5],'-',gls.[SEGMENT6]),'-----') AS [Concatenated Segments]
	,			[po].[Item Description]
	,			CAST([Ordered Quantity] AS NUMERIC(28,4)) - [Received Quantity] AS [Open Ordered Quantity]
	,			p2.[Party Name] AS [Supplier]
	,			po.[Purchase Order Number] AS [Order]
	,			CAST(LEFT([po].[PO Creation Date],10) AS DATE) AS [Report Date]
	,			pl.[LOCATION_CODE] AS [Location Code]
	,			pod.[QUANTITY_ORDERED] AS [Distribution Quantity]
	,			po.[Unit Price] AS [Price]
	,			pod.[AMOUNT_DELIVERED] AS [Delivered Amount in Funtional Currency]
	,			po.[Unit Price] * CAST(pod.[QUANTITY_ORDERED] AS DECIMAL(28,4)) AS [Total Price]
	,			po.[Purchase Document Status] AS [Schedule Status]
	,			gls.[SEGMENT2] AS [Cost Centre Code]
	,			gld.[DESCRIPTION] AS [Cost Centre Description]
	,			o.[Business Unit Name] AS [Business Unit]
	,			cat.[CATEGORY_CODE]	AS [Category Name]
	,			tv.[DESCRIPTION] AS [Project Segment Description]
	,			gls.[SEGMENT4] AS [Project Segment Value]
	,			pod.[AMOUNT_BILLED] AS [Delivered Amount]
	,			pod.[QUANTITY_DELIVERED] AS [Delivered Quantity]
	,			lcc.[LEDGER_CURRENCY_CODE]	AS [Ledger Currency]
	,			[Purchase Document Currency] AS [Default Currency] -- set to purchase document currency
	INTO		[Operations].[GroupCapexCommitedExpenditure]
	FROM		Core.PurchaseOrders po -- 136,118
	LEFT JOIN	Core.Users u
	ON			u.[Person ID] = po.[Buyer] --136,118
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		DISTINCT [Party Name]
					,			[Party Email Address]
					FROM		Core.Parties
				) p
	ON			u.[Username] = p.[Party Email Address]
	LEFT JOIN	Core.PO_Distributions pod
	ON			po.[PO Header ID] = pod.[PO_HEADER_ID]
	AND			po.[PO Line ID] = pod.[PO_LINE_ID]
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_SegmentsInScope gls
	ON			pod.[CODE_COMBINATION_ID] = gls.[CODE_COMBINATION_ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[PO Distribution ID]
					,			SUM(CAST([Primary Quantity] AS DECIMAL(28,4))) AS [Received Quantity]
					FROM		Core.ReceivingTransactions
					WHERE		[Transaction Type] = 'RECEIVE'
					GROUP BY	[PO Distribution ID]
				) rq
	ON			rq.[PO Distribution ID] = pod.[PO_DISTRIBUTION_ID]
	LEFT JOIN	Core.Suppliers s
	ON			s.[Vendor ID] = po.[Supplier]
	AND			s.[Vendor Site ID] = po.[Supplier Site]
	LEFT JOIN	Core.Parties p2
	ON			p2.[Party ID] = s.[Party ID]
	AND			p2.[Party SIte ID] = s.[Party Site ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		DISTINCT [Business Unit ID]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
					FROM		Core.Organizations
				) o
	ON			o.[Business Unit ID] = po.[Purchasing BU]
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_Descriptions gld
	ON			gld.[SEGMENT] = gls.[SEGMENT2]
	AND			gld.[VALUE_CATEGORY] = 'Cost Centre Argent'
	LEFT JOIN	(

				SELECT DISTINCT [SOURCE_DOC_NUMBER], [LEDGER_CURRENCY_CODE] 
				FROM		[RAW].[O.CMR_RCV_DISTRIBUTIONS] crd

				LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.CMR_RCV_EVENTS] cre

				ON			cre.[ACCOUNTING_EVENT_ID] = crd.[ACCOUNTING_EVENT_ID]

				WHERE [EVENT_SOURCE] = 'PO'
				) lcc
	ON			po.[Purchase Order Number] = lcc.[SOURCE_DOC_NUMBER]
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.FND_VS_TYPED_VALUES_VL] tv
	ON			tv.[VALUE] = gls.[SEGMENT4]
	AND			tv.[VALUE_SET_ID] = '55004'
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[PER_Locations] pl
	ON			po.[Ship to Location ID] = pl.[LOCATION_ID]
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[EGP_Categories_B] cat
	ON			cat.[CATEGORY_ID] = po.[Category ID]
	WHERE		po.[Purchase Document Status] NOT IN ('Rejected','Canceled')
	AND			gls.[SEGMENT4] != '00000'

IF OBJECT_ID('Operations.PastPO_NotReceipted','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE Operations.PastPO_NotReceipted

	SELECT		p.[PchId] AS [PO Number]
	,			p.[PchDescr] AS [PO Description]
	,			v.[VdrDescr] AS [Vendor Description]
	,			ISNULL(s.[SUSEDES],'Unknown') AS [UserEmail]
	,			pl.[PchlLineId] AS [PO Line]
	,			pl.[PchlDescr] AS [PO Line Description]
	,			pl.[PchlTotPrice] AS [Price]
	,			pl.[PchlCurId] AS [Currency]
	,			CASE 
					WHEN pl.[PchlCurId] = 'GBP'
						THEN pl.[PchlTotPrice]/NULLIF([fx].[EUR GBP],0) 
					ELSE pl.[PchlTotPrice]
				END AS [Price EUR]
	,			CASE 
					WHEN pl.[PchlCurId] = 'EUR'
						THEN pl.[PchlTotPrice] * [fx].[EUR GBP] 
					ELSE pl.[PchlTotPrice]
				END AS [Price GBP]
	,			pl.[PchlDepId] AS [Dept]
	,			pl.[_PCHLPCHTYPEID] AS [Order Type]
	,			[rs].[SRECSCDES] AS [Line Status]
	,			pl.PchlDlvDate
	INTO		Operations.PastPO_NotReceipted
	FROM		Ultimo.Purchase p
	LEFT JOIN	Ultimo.PurchaseLine pl
	ON			p.[PchId] = pl.[PchlPchId]
	LEFT JOIN	Ultimo.Vendor v
	ON			p.[PchVdrId] = v.[VdrId]
	LEFT JOIN	Ultimo.SUSER s
	ON			p.[PchRequestEmpId] = s.[SUSEEMPID]
	LEFT JOIN	[Ultimo].[SRECORDSTATUSCOUNTRY] rs
	ON			rs.[SRECSCSTATUS] = pl.[PchlRecStatus]
	AND			[rs].[SRECSCREC] = 'PURCHASELINE'
	AND			[rs].[SRECSCCOU] = 'EN'
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[FXRates] fx
	ON			fx.[CONVERSION_DATE] = pl.PchlDlvDate
	WHERE		[rs].[SRECSCDES] IN ('Draft','Active','Partially received')
	AND			pl.PchlDlvDate <= CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
